= jCOMODI =
This is the web page for [comodi:wiki COMODI]'s Java library '''jCOMODI'''.

== learn more ==
* about the [[API]]
* the [ComodiSerialisation#RDFXML RDF/XML] serialisation
* the [ComodiSerialisation#TURTLE TURTLE] serialisation

== include jCOMODI using Maven ==


* [http://mvn.sems.uni-rostock.de/releases/de/unirostock/sems/jCOMODI/ find latest version id]
* import the [https://sems.uni-rostock.de/2013/10/maven-repository/ SEMS Maven repository]
* add the following dependency to your project:

{{{
#!xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>de.unirostock.sems</groupId>
    <artifactId>jCOMODI</artifactId>
    <version>$VERSION</version>
</dependency>
}}}

== Download ==
Binaries can be obtain from our binary repository: http://bin.sems.uni-rostock.de/jCOMODI

Sources can be found:
* in the browse source tab, see source:src/main/java/de/unirostock/sems/comodi
* at GitHub: https://github.com/binfalse/jCOMODI
* on our git server `sems.uni-rostock.de:jcomodi`
